page.title: 18PARENT'S JOBS
page.content: Quite a few of our mums and dads work on a farm nearby. Some of them work in and might own a shop or pub. Some have their own businesses like being a carpenter. Most mums do not work because they have little children or there are no jobs they could do close enough. Quite a lot of dads and mums that can work have to go to another place to work like Salisbury or Shaftesbury or Mere. A few have office jobs. Quite a few people have animals which they raise to eat and the women look after these and the men when they come home from work. Most mums and dads who can work go to work. Quite a few people do not work in this area because they are too old and have retired.
